anathema: Avoid personal change, kill a plant or a creature with cold damage, seal a building to completely block sunlight
edict: Bring order to places of chaos, kill evil monsters and fiends, encourage just laws, provide warmth where needed

<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Ra (King of the Heavens)](/Deities.aspx?ID=521)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 314

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dead or Missing Deities](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=34)

**Edicts** Bring order to places of chaos, kill evil monsters and fiends, encourage just laws, provide warmth where needed

**Anathema** Avoid personal change, kill a plant or a creature with cold damage, seal a building to completely block sunlight

**Area of Concern**
Creation, rulership, the sun

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=365)

**Domains** [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=76), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=92), [Time](/Domains.aspx?ID=121)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Breathe Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=1457)

- **2nd**
[Floating Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=1533)

- **3rd**
[Threefold Aspect](/Spells.aspx?ID=2038)

</column>
